message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe is worth a significant amount to you.  While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can tell you it holds a potential value of $1,200,000 for someone with your expertise. I'm willing to let it go for $1,100,000, giving you a substantial profit. This is a one-time offer, so please consider it carefully. If you decline, I have another buyer lined up who will gladly take it off my hands.
